data.text: @Oh_Kalypso Ok, please send all details and we will check it up.//Brgds Petra

data.text: @Oh_Kalypso Hi, if you sent your errand in April and haven't heard anything from us we want to check that it have been put on correct handling queue. Please send all details in enclosed link and refer that you have been sent from twitter. //Regards, Petra https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt

@fplidontknow If you call any of our Sales Offices they can check what happened. Perhaps you could try via the chat as well but they might not be able to check. 
Visit https://t.co/A111I68IZi and type chat in the automatic helper and go further. //JH

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@lovesRyan123 Our Customer Care dpeartment have alot to do due to the covid situation and I guess that is the reason for the late reply. 
You can however visit https://t.co/cE0TvFYaMV again and there send them a new message or better answer them on the mail you got asked for more info on. /JH
@FabriceRiviere1 Hello Fabrice! Our refund department has received a large amount of refund cases, so our handling time is longer than what it normally is. We apologize for this! Kind regards, Alice

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text: @ThomasWavrant Refund notice for your 2 tickets have now been sent to the e-mail address registered in the booking.

@Enik_Altrusian Hi. It sounds as if your ip has been blocked by our automatic ip blocker or something. Could you visit https://t.co/3yKBlKRQbD and then copy your public ip address and then contact us by phone or chat and there give them that ip and we will be able to check if that is the case.

@dsfrederik Hi. It depends on what kind of booking it is. If it is based on a round trip pricing concept or one way. When you booked it and the rules etc. 
To be able to get an answer please call any of our Sales Offices and they can check what applies to your reservation. // JH
@Grommoen Ring oss på telefon 21 89 64 00 så att vi får ta en titt på din bokning och se om en återbetalning har gjorts av resan.

urls.title: Refund Status
urls.description: Here you can check the status of your submitted refund request or SAS Travel Voucher request. Enter your Booking Reference and your Last Name

data.text: @sarah_mccorm I am sorry for the long waiting time, hopefully it will soon be your case that will be handled. You can follow the status of your refund request here: https://t.co/bFVXlI0MnV
@Grommoen Vår förhoppning är att det inte ska dröja allt för länge nu. Du kan följa status på ditt ärende här: https://t.co/kBw1lQSMNL
@sandye247 Hi, yes that is ok.//Regards, Petra

urls.title: Refund Status
urls.description: Here you can check the status of your submitted refund request or SAS Travel Voucher request. Enter your Booking Reference and your Last Name

data.text: @champerscharl I am sorry for the long waiting time. Through this link you can follow the status of your refund request: https://t.co/bFVXlI0MnV

@ashleyhow I am so sorry for the long waiting time. Usually it is your Travel Agency that should perform the refund but since this has not been done I have forwarded your case to our Refunds department to see if they can assist in any way.

data.text: @philmdot Hello Philippe! That sounds strange. Have you checked with your bank?  I'm afraid we can't check specific refunds over social media, but I would recommend that you contact us via either Facebook Messenger or via phone again so we can investigate this further. Kind regards, Alice

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text: @RachaelMoodie Hi Rachael, welcome to Sweden, you find all necessary information in enclosed link. //Regards, Petra https://t.co/bG6acgHGid
@wwllp Hi Diamon, please call our customer service so they can take a look at both of your bookings.///Regards, Petra

data.text: @sandye247 We are not open for DM´s on Twitter, please use the DM option on our Facebook page instead.
@alagonzalez Hi. Please call any of our Sales Offices to get more information on what could be done here. // JH

@StraumannKeyAcc Hi. It sounds as if you try to order a journey on a market that has a different currency than the voucher. 
If your voucher is in GBP then it has to be booked/paid on the UK site. If it's in SEK it has to be on the Swedish site. // JH
@dsfrederik Hi. It will be handled as a new reservation that has been cancelled with a new voucher as a result.//H
@RivetEmile Okay, then it's fine to bring as hand luggage. The batteries do however need to be individually protected in the bag. Have a nice trip :) Kind regards, Alice

@jozzgs Hello, thank you for contacting us. 
We would have to see the booking reference in order to confirm that the booking is cancelled as requested. 
If that's not possible we must ask that you contact our customer service again in the morning. 
Best regards, Dennis.

data.text: @IBambalaite Hi Indrè, please send all details to us in enclosed link and we will check that your errand have been sent on correct handling queue. Mention that you have been sent from twitter. Wish you a Merry Christmas! //Regards, Petra https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt

Happy holidays from all of us at SAS💙
 
From SAS colleagues all across the world, we wish you a happy holiday season. We hope that you get to spend time with your loved ones, that you stay safe and take care. 

We long to welcome you on board again soon.

#flysas #wearetravelers https://t.co/a2vmS2SjDC
@ClaraFi95145526 Hi, please contact danish customer service when they open tomorrow morning 07.00 local time. You reach them on phone +45 70 10 20 00 //Regards, Petra
@winmor1 Norwegian customer service open 07.00 norwegian time ..so your son can call them directly when they open. ///Brgds Petra
@winmor1 Hi Winston, you can if you want call any of our Scandinavian customer service they open up tomorrow 8 o'clock british time. You call either +46 8 797 40 00 or +47 21 896 400 //Regards, Petra

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @AmirPars_ I have no information about that since the Covid-19 restrictions can change from day to day. Please keep an eye on our website and also on both the Brittish and Swedish authorities websites for the latest infomation.
@AmirPars_ Hi Amir, I have no information about that at the moment. //Regards, Petra
@mighty_eyebrow The info I have today is that 540, 502 and 4616 is cancelled tomorrow, this might change. In such case we send message to passengers booked on specific flight. //Regards, Petra
@oliviagibbins you should be able to call either the +46 or +45 number they are closed now but open up again 08.00 local British time. //Brgds Petra
@oliviagibbins Hi, he can if he want call any of our Scandinavian customer services, if you check contacts you find phone number there. //Regards, Petra
@Moolenbeek Hi again, if it's possible it's best to change to correct spelling. //Brgds Petra
@Moolenbeek Hi Maarten, I can't do it from here but if you call our customer service they can check and help you//Regards, Petra
@misspaulapk Hi, if the flight is changed or cancelled we send message about it. //Regards, Petra
@RJSkogeby Hi Richard, please call our customer service so they can take a look at your booking. //Regards, Petra
@jegerpizza Hi Simon, please call our customer service so they can take a look at your errand and assist you with cancellation. //Regards, Petra
@AmirPars_ Hi! If your flight gets cancelled, you will be notified on our website and through SMS. You can also view our website for the latest info about flights and news. / Christian
@ukmoose Hi! If a flight gets cancelled, you will be notified directly by text ot on the website. // Christian
@shaggyreid Hej! Så fort en flight blir inställd så meddelar vi direkt. Vänligen håll koll på din telefon för SMS samt på vår hemsida om eventuellt ny information skulle komma. Hälsningar, Christian
@emildyrvik Hej Emil, tack för din fråga. Ring till vår kundservice så får de kolla upp om du kan omboka din biljett och om det är någon kostnad för det. Ha en fin dag. Hälsningar Anki

@Rowanalamin Hi Rowan, thanks for your information. Your flight is still active in our timetable so at the moment it is going as scheduled. Please keep an eye on our website if there is last minute changes. Have a great Sunday. Regards Anki
@Rowanalamin Hello Rowan! Can you please return with your flight number and the specific date for your travel? That way we can check if we have any information! Kind regards, Alice
@saba_m_h Hi, you need to ask if it is possible when you arrive in London. Regards Anki

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@saba_m_h Hi, I enclose a link to our website where you can find all our phone numbers. Select your Country or region first. Have a great weekend. Regards Anki
https://t.co/fxd6BsEJUx

@saba_m_h Hi, thanks for your question. You will get the assistance only on the flight you choose. You can contact our customer service so they can help you check this and book on your whole journey. Regards Anki

@tony59146462 Hi Tony! I'm sorry about the delay!
Have you reported your baggage as delayed? If so, we will begin an immediate search for your bag and will contact you via text message and e-mail once we have more information. Kind regards, Alice

@DebbieTutty Hi! For cases about schedule changes, please contact our Customer Service or check your booking under "manage my bookin" and you will have all information there.
Best regards, Christian
@semhartley If you have questions regarding your booking please call any of our Sales Offices or Chat and they can then via booking reference etc check what have happened. //JH
@anitasingsasong I am sorry for the long waiting time. If you sent in your request for refund in April it should not take too long now before your errand will be handled.

@lololachaize Hi. Sorry for the long handling time. This reservation were handled in November but it looks like the robot weren't successful in doing so. I've asked the refund department to look at it as fast as possible.

data.text: @JoeD_Nufc Yes it is. On our website https://t.co/saQXo2wpQa you can see which dates we are operating :-)

@DolphDesigner Hi there, We wish you good luck with the assignment :) Best Regards, Tobias

data.text: @megt97x Hi Meg, please send your details in enclosed link and we will check that it have been put o correct handling queue. Refer that you have been sent from twitter.//Regards, Petra  https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt

@poacher2k Hi, hard to say why that happened. Did you have the old e-mail in a reservation? Or signed up for newsletter with that e-mail? To investigate this further please contact our Sales Office via phone and they can check if they can find the reason. //JH

@SelinaBrinkman5 Almost all of our tickets are possible to change, so pick up your booking on our website and make your rebooking or call our Customer Service for assistance. If you have used a travel agency, then contact them to rebook your journey.

urls.description: The safety of our travelers and staff is always our highest priority. In these days with travel restrictions it is also important to get yourself ready to travel »

data.text: @Landermannen Each airline have their own policy regarding face masks on board. You can read about ours here: https://t.co/E6bpHzaWLm

data.text: @mahemama Ledsen om vi varit otydliga i vårt svar till dig. I CPH finns det 2 lounger - SAS Gold Lounge och SAS Lounge. Det är endast SAS Gold Lounge som är öppen för närvarande men även passagerare med SAS Business eller SAS Plus biljetter är välkomna att besöka den just nu.

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@LailaKjelstadli Hello Laila! You can send a complaint to our Customer Care on the following link https://t.co/zteoJK8xxx
Kind regards, Alice
@mariodomu Hi! Great to hear from you! Please visit our website and click the banner at the top for all information about cancellations and refunds. / Christian
@SelinaBrinkman5 Hi Selina, what options are you searching for? //Regards, Petra
@katiebcomedy Great, I hope my colleagues at Refunds will have the time to look at it pretty soon.

@katiebcomedy I am sorry for the long waiting time and that you feel that you get no response when contacting the travel agent or us. Please use this link and we will have a look at your ticket: https://t.co/Y7XCcQ5U7a

@SelinaBrinkman5 It depends on what kind of ticket you have and if you have paid with money, EuroBonus points or voucher. If you have a Business ticket or a Plus ticket with flexible refund rules you can cancel the booking and receive a refund. In some cases you can also cancel and get a voucher.

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text: @iamjennie Hi, you would need to talk to our Sales Office or contact our Customer Care department via the form on https://t.co/cE0TvFYaMV to see if that is possible. They would then also need to know what kind of voucher it is etc. //JH

@MaxWilson1001 Hello again. 
It's hard to say due to the current situation. 
We always update our time schedule on our website if more flights are added so I can only suggest that you keep an eye open for any changes.
Best regards, Dennis.
@mahemama Hej, Den kommer vara öppen hela December bortsett från den 24, 25 och 31 December. Vänligen, Tobias

@chbkw Hej. Jag har ingen information om just detta flyg. Jag har skickat ut lite trevare för att hoppas någon med dess historia kan svara. Men vi får se om det ger någon respons. Men annars så har vi många duktiga flygvänner som brukar kunna hjälpa till som följer oss. Kanske de vet.

@13_Beaches Hello Dominik! Is the E-ticket number a SAS number (117-)? If you are still experiencing problems, kindly report this to us here: https://t.co/0nJ7HSdQlt Have a nice day! Kind regards, Alice

data.text: @Tanner_Jae Hi, Unfortunately we cannot look in to specific cases via Twitter. I recommend that you contact our Customer Service if you have not received them in the end of the week.  Regards, Tobias

urls.title: Carry On Baggage – Size and Weight Limits
urls.description: You can always bring one carry-on bag (8 kg) and one personal item in the cabin free of charge. Your allowance depends on your travel class »

data.text: @felipezam Hello Felipe! Please take a look at the following page and you will see a pop-up with the current rules regarding carry-on. https://t.co/2UUXPRN2w1 Kind regards, Alice
@Nadia_R_Thorius Hi! Thank you for waiting for our response. We do not accept this product on flights due to safety and monitoring of health. / Christian

@dreves I am sorry for the long waiting time. So far we have processed over 1,7 million errands but there are still several hundred thousands on queue for handling. Due to the huge volumes the handling time is way much longer than normal.
